params.name: The string to be printed after hello

plugins.name: json2ts

params.json: The JSON object to convert into TypeScript interfaces

plugins.description: A plugin to convert a JSON object to TypeScript interface. The result is automatically copied into the clipboard.

plugins.name: jwtDecode

params.jwtToken: A jwt token. Usually from the localStorage, but you can pass a string, of course

plugins.description: A plugin to decode a JWT token to a JSON object and explore it in the console
